events.name: Tottenham Hotspur at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Tottenham's nightmare week got even worse as they lost 3-0 at Brighton following their 7-2 defeat against Bayern Munich in the Champions League.

video.headline: Are Pochettino and Solskjaer's fates tied together?

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Are Pochettino and Solskjaer's fates tied together?) 2019/10/4 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs loss at Brighton ends nightmare week

headlines.description: A 72nd-minute volley from Jeff Hendrick gave Burnley a 1-0 win over Everton in the Premier League at Turf Moor on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton slump again as Hendrick sends Burnley into fourth

headlines.description: Liverpool won for the 17th Premier League match in a row to temporarily move eight points clear following a 2-1 win over Leicester.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool go eight clear with win over Leicester

headlines.description: Brazilian striker Wesley scored twice and missed a penalty as Aston Villa thumped injury-hit Norwich City 5-1 at Carrow Road.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wesley scores twice as Villa rout Norwich 5-1

headlines.description: Watford and Sheffield United played out a 0-0 draw at Vicarage Road on Saturday to leave Quique Sanchez Flores' side at the bottom of the table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford stay bottom after draw with Sheffield United

events.name: Crystal Palace at West Ham United

headlines.description: Jordan Ayew scored a VAR-assisted 88th-minute goal to complete a Crystal Palace comeback in a hard-fought 2-1 victory at West Ham United.
headlines.shortLinkText: VAR-assisted goal helps Palace past West Ham
